19 Sep 2013

Icon apps updated

Icns Maker and Icon Builder have both just been updated to support Xcode 5.

1 Apr 2013

Markdown

For some time now, I have been aware of the increasing trend towards using Markdown for text editing and for creating HTML. Markdown has been on my list of “things I should learn some day” so I was interested last week to read about a new iBooks book called [The MacSparky Markdown Field Guide][1]. This was sufficient inspiration so I got the book and read through it this weekend.

27 Feb 2013

A Knight’s Move 1.3

A Knight’s Move has been updated to version 1.3. The iOS version is now available at the iTunes App Store and the Mac version is available through the Mac App Store.

6 Feb 2013

Sand-Boxing Man Reader

These instructions are no longer valid. As of version 1.5, the App Store version of Man Reader has solved the sand-boxing issues and is now as powerful as the non-sand-boxed version.

6 Feb 2013

Man Reader (no SB)

These instructions are no longer valid. As of version 1.5, the App Store version of Man Reader has solved the sand-boxing issues and is now as powerful as the non-sand-boxed version.
